title: The Effect of Dose Titration and Dose Tapering on the Tolerability of DVS SR in Women With Vasomotor Symptoms Associated With Menopause: The PRIMMUS (PRIstiq for Managing Menopause and Understanding Symptoms) Study

operands.value: Generally healthy, postmenopausal woman who seeks treatment for hot flushes.
At least 12 months of spontaneous amenorrhea
At least 6 months of spontaneous amenorrhea with serum follicle-stimulating hormone (FSH) levels > 40 mIU/mL
At least 6 weeks postsurgical bilateral oophorectomy (with or without hysterectomy)
Hysterectomized without bilateral oophorectomy and with serum FSH levels > 40 mIU/mL
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
History of a seizure disorder other than a single childhood febrile seizure.
History or presence of clinically important hepatic or renal disease or other medical disease.
Presence or recent history of major depressive disorder, bipolar disorder, psychotic disorder, or generalized anxiety disorder requiring therapy.

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('Generally healthy, postmenopausal woman who seeks treatment for hot flushes.'), Symbol('Must be FEMALE'), Symbol('Must have minimum age of 18 Years'), Not(Or(Symbol('History of a seizure disorder other than a single childhood febrile seizure.'), Symbol('History or presence of clinically important hepatic or renal disease or other medical disease.'), Symbol('Presence or recent history of major depressive disorder, bipolar disorder, psychotic disorder, or generalized anxiety disorder requiring therapy.'))), Or(Symbol('At least 12 months of spontaneous amenorrhea'), Symbol('At least 6 months of spontaneous amenorrhea with serum follicle-stimulating hormone (FSH) levels > 40 mIU/mL'), Symbol('At least 6 weeks postsurgical bilateral oophorectomy (with or without hysterectomy)'), Symbol('Hysterectomized without bilateral oophorectomy and with serum FSH levels > 40 mIU/mL')))
